data.title: Bypolls: BJP Loses Kairana LS Seat, SP Wins Noorpur Assembly Seat
data.meta_description: The results of the by-election to the Kairana Lok Sabha seat, which went to polls on 28 May, will be declared on Thursday, 31 May. The seat fell vacant after the death of BJP MP Hukum Singh, whose daughter Mriganka Singh is now the party candidate.
data.text:
RLD candidate Tabassum Hasan wins Kairana by a margin of 44,618 votes

SP candidate Naeemul Hasan wins Noorpur Assembly seat

SP’s Akhilesh Yadav reacted to the bypoll results, saying, “This is a defeat for those who do not believe in democracy”

“To take a giant leap, you’ll have to take two steps back,” said Rajnath Singh after BJP’s setback in the bypolls

LIVE: BJP losing in Kairana (UP), leading in Palghar (Maharashtra). BJP-NCP neck-and-neck in Bhandara Gondia (Maharashtra). What do these bypoll results mean for 2019?

Posted by The Quint on Wednesday, May 30, 2018

Finally Tally In, RLD Wins By a Margin of 44,618 Votes

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 4,81,182

BJP's Mriganka Singh: 4,36,564

'To Take a Giant Leap, You'll Have to Take Two Steps Back': Rajnath Singh

To take a giant leap, you will have to take two steps back. We will take a giant leap in the future.

Home Minister Rajnath Singh

'This is a Defeat for Those Who Don't Believe in Democracy': Akhilesh Yadav

Live: SP president Akhilesh Yadav addresses media on By-Polls

Posted by The Quint on Thursday, May 31, 2018

People have given a befitting reply to the BJP… We have learnt from the BJP the game that they used to play with us. It was said that farmers will get a loan waiver, but did that happen? Instead, farmers lost their lives. This is a big betrayal.

Akhilesh Yadav

After 20 Rounds of Counting, RLD Leads by 49,291 Votes

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 4,01,464

BJP's Mriganka Singh: 3,52,173

I am Disappointed But Not Defeated: BJP's Kairana Candidate

RLD Leader Jayant Chaudhary Addresses Media

Live: RLD Leader Jayant Chaudhary Addresses Media

Live: RLD leader Jayant Chaudhary addresses media on the partyâs expected victory from Kairana

Posted by The Quint on Thursday, May 31, 2018

After 19 Rounds of Counting, RLD Leads by 45,311 Votes

Sources told The Quint that after 19 rounds of counting, the current tally stands as follows:

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 3,81,353

BJP’s Mriganka Singh: 3,36,042

After 16 Rounds of Counting, RLD's Lead Falls to 33,631 Votes

Sources told The Quint that after 16 rounds of counting, the current tally stands as follows:

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 3,50,821

BJP’s Mriganka Singh: 3,17,190

SP Wins Noorpur Assembly Seat

Sources told The Quint that after 15 rounds of counting, the current tally stands as follows:

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 3,40,211

BJP’s Mriganka Singh: 2,70,435

Arvind Kejriwal Takes a Dig at PM Modi

Sources told The Quint that after 14 rounds of counting, the current tally stands as follows:

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 2,71,130

BJP’s Mriganka Singh: 2,12,845

This is Victory of truth: Tabassum Hasan, RLD Candidate

After 12 Rounds of Counting, RLD Leads by 40,096 Votes

Sources told The Quint that after 12 rounds of counting, the current tally stands as follows:

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 1,22,620

BJP’s Mriganka Singh: 82,524

After 11 Rounds of Counting, RLD Takes Lead by 39,224 Votes

Sources told The Quint that after 11 rounds of counting, the current tally stands as follows:

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 1,19,113

BJP’s Mriganka Singh: 79,889

Dalits and Backward Classes are Ignoring Us: Om Prakash Rajbhar, UP Minister

After 10 Rounds of Counting, RLD Takes Lead of 34,600 Votes

Sources told The Quint that after 10 rounds of counting, the current tally stands as follows:

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 1,09,962

BJP’s Mriganka Singh: 75,315

Sources told The Quint that after nine rounds of counting, the current tally stands as follows:

RLD’s Tabassum Hasan: 1,00,795

BJP’s Mriganka Singh: 70,238
